title: US Attention Data
subtitle: Wikipedia views, Google Trends, GDELT coverage for US topics in 2025
description:
Digital attention metrics tracking Wikipedia pageviews, Google Trends search interest, and GDELT global event coverage for United States-related topics throughout 2025.

## Data Sources

- **Wikimedia REST API**: CC0 Public Domain
- **Google Trends** (via pytrends): Google TOS
- **GDELT 2.1 Doc API**: Free for research and commercial use

## Stats

- 10 data files, 4.3 MB total
- Date range: 2025-01-01 to 2025-12-31
- Geographic coverage: United States (primary), 44 countries (GDELT)

## Visualizations

- [One-Year US Global Sentiment](https://dr.eamer.dev/datavis/one-year) - GDELT timeline
- [Trends 2025](https://dr.eamer.dev/datavis/trends-2025) - Google Trends data
- [Wikipedia Attention Analytics](https://dr.eamer.dev/datavis/wiki-attention) - Pageviews
